product_name: Salewa Rapace Gore-Tex Mountaineering Boots - Men's
long_description: The Salewa Rapace Gore-Tex Mountaineering boots are lightweight, agile, and crampon-compatible, making them the perfect choice for light mountaineering and technical routes. Suede leather uppers with Cordura(R) nylon accents feature full rubber rands for superior protection on approach hikes. Salewa Y support system runs steel wire along the ankles and heels for lightweight support and heel containment; supportive design makes them great for carrying a pack. Gore-Tex(R) waterproof membranes let feet breathe while protecting them from the elements, keeping you dry and comfortable. Nylon linings wick moisture away from the feet for comfort during intense activities. EVA midsoles absorb shock, cushion feet and provide gentle support. Nylon plates built into the midsoles offer support and stability; stiff soles allow the use of hybrid crampons. Vibram mountaineering rubber outsoles are equally suited for snow and ice as well as dry, rocky surfaces.
short_description: The Salewa Rapace Gore-Tex Mountaineering boots are lightweight, agile, and crampon-compatible, making them the perfect choice for light mountaineering and technical routes.
